Class Course

java.lang.Object
Course
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable, Searchable<Course>
public class Course extends Object implements Comparable, Searchable<Course>
The Course class represents a course offered in an academic institution. Each course has a unique course code, a title, and a number of credit hours.

Fields:

  • code - the course code (e.g., "COP3330")
  • title - the course title (e.g., "Object-Oriented Programming")
  • credit - the number of credit hours the course is worth

This class implements the Searchable interface, allowing it to be used in search and comparison operations within collections.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Object obj)
      Compares this Course object with the specified object for order. The comparison is primarily based on the number of credit hours. If the credit hours are equal, the comparison falls back to lexicographically comparing the course codes.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to be compared, which is expected to be a Course.
      Returns:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this Course is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified Course. - Returns the difference in credit hours if they differ. - Returns the result of comparing course codes if credit hours are equal.
      Throws:
      ClassCastException - if the specified object is not a Course.

    • isMatch

      public boolean isMatch(String key)
      Determines if the course matches the given search key. A match occurs if the key is found in either the course code or the title (case-insensitive).
      Specified by:
      isMatch in interface Searchable<Course>
      Parameters:
      key - the search key to compare against the code and title
      Returns:
      true if the key matches either the code or the title, false otherwise

    • isEqual

      public boolean isEqual(Course obj)
      Compares this course with another object for equality. Two courses are considered equal if their code, title, and credit hours are all equal.
      Specified by:
      isEqual in interface Searchable<Course>
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to compare with
      Returns:
      true if the courses are equal, false otherwise
